content.text:
# Karl Schwarzschild Medal__disambig_1

The Karl Schwarzschild Medal, named after the astrophysicist Karl Schwarzschild, is an award presented by the Astronomische Gesellschaft (German Astronomical Society) to eminent astronomers and astrophysicists.
Recipients
Source: [https://web.archive.org/web/20150727111712/http://www.astronomische-gesellschaft.org/en/die-ag/auszeichnungen/schwarzschild/ German Astronomical Society]
